utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I...reorganized the fridge. See, bottom shelf: meats and dairy. Middle shelf: fruits and vegetables. And top shelf: expired products.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Why are you doing this?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Because I am bored...Out of my mind. I’ve already been to the bank, post office, and the dry cleaners.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, you just described seven days worth of stuff. You’ve got to spread it out a little, you know. Haven’t you ever been unemployed?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, I am not unemployed. I’m on sabbatical!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, don’t get religious on me, ok. A guy in your position needs to be a little better at relaxing. You know. Why do you think we have the comfortable chairs? Huh...come here…sit down. Ready? Ahh!! Ohh, yeah!! Huh?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So what, we just sit?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ohh, no, no. We’re not going to just sit. Shhh.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hello, Chandler Bing.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello Mr. Bing...I love you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Alright, whoever this is, stop calling me! It’s been six months! It’s not funny!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: But, I love you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Leave me alone! For the love of God, leave me alone!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And that’s Wednesday. Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey you guys, guess what?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The British are coming?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, you and your ways. Since it’s Christmastime. I’m going to be one of those people collection donations.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I already have my bell and later on...I get my bucket.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ohh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, yeah, I’m going to be out there spreading joy to the people. I mean, last year, I spread a little joy but not really enough. So this year, I’m going to do the whole city.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You know, I knew a girl in high school who did that. She was very popular.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So Pheebs, where are you doing all, your bell ringing?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Ohh, they gave me a great spot. Right by Macys. Yeah, they hardly ever give such a good spot to a rookie, but I’m the only one who can sing "Merry Christmas" in 25 languages. I lied.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh my god. Ok you guys, there’s Danny. Watch. Just watch this. See?! Still pretending he’s not interested. Ohh, he’s coming over. Just pretend like we don’t know him. We’ve forgotten who he is.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Hey guys.

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Hey Danny.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Danny? You know Rachel? She’s nice. She’s not bad to look at, right?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Thanks, Mon.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Well, of course.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you want to go out on a date with her?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica!!!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Absolutely! Is Friday okay?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Friday’s perfect...She can’t wait.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: On the date, I will be able to talk to her directly? See ya Friday.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay. What the hell was that? You know what? Don’t answer me. I have a date with Danny.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How could I not get the part? The play was about a 29-year-old Italian actor from Queens.

utterance.speaker: Estelle
utterance.content: Well, Telia Shire suddenly became available.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: She’s a woman!

utterance.speaker: Estelle
utterance.content: What can I say? She nailed it.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, is there anything else?

utterance.speaker: Estelle
utterance.content: Well, you’re just going to say no again but...gay porn.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Happy Holidays. Feliz Navidad. Allo, and Merry Christmas. Ohh thank you sir. Here's some joy.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Phoebe!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I just wanted to see how it's going.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, it's going okay.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well good, here let me help you out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, thanks!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Is that a new Swede jacket? It looks really expensive.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah. I guess.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Just get your nails done?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes Phoebe, but this is all I have. Okay?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay! Thanks! Happy Holidays, here's your joy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank you! And Happy Holidays.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Wait, you can't take the money out.

utterance.speaker: The Man
utterance.content: I'm making change. I need change for the bus.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: But, can't you leave the dollar? This money is for the poor.

utterance.speaker: The Man
utterance.content: I'm poor! I gotta take the bus!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Okay, Seasons Greetings and everything, but still…

utterance.speaker: The Man
utterance.content: Bite me, blondie!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, I'm going to give him something else besides joy, just…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That part was perfect for me! I can't believe I didn't get it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm sorry, man. Hey, y'know what you should do? You should make something happen for yourself. Y'know, like-like write a play. Write a movie! Huh? I mean, what about those Good Will Hunting guys?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on Ross be realistic, y'know? If I did write something, what are the chances I could get those guys to star in it?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wait a second, I could star in it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Or that.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can't write! Y'know I mean I-I-I'm an actor, I don't have the discipline that takes, y'know? I can't do it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'll help you. Yeah, I'll make up a schedule and make sure you stick to it. And plus, it'll give me something to do.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really? You'd-you'd do that for me?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right, we'll start off slow. The only thing you have to do tonight is come up with the name of your main character.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Done!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And it can't be Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's not.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Or Joseph.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey, what's up?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I just saw Danny getting on the subway with a girl and he had his arm around her.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, honey, I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, you should be, this is all your fault! You meddled in our relationship!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You had no relationship!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, but I was doing my thing and everything was going according to the plan!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh God, stop with the plan! So what, so what you saw him with a girl? Who cares?! That doesn't mean anything! Now look, you're going to go out on a date with Danny and you're going to be so charming he's gonna forget all about that stupid subway girl.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: She was kinda stupid. You're right. All right, I'm just gonna go on the date. I'm gonna go on the date. That is the new plan.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Come on, hurry!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, how do you spell suspicious?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Because I think this character is going to be suspicious about stuff.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes! Chandler Bing, 7! Chandler Bing, 0.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're driving me crazy with that!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, I'll stop.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don’t stop! Move the bowl further away! Ross could make that shot!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, you suck! But at least you suck at a man's game now.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You wanna play?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Chandler, I can't be playing games, Ross is gonna be home soon. And I have to write five whole pages if I'm gonna stick to his schedule.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, so, play for the next 30 minutes and then write until he gets home.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right! But uh, listen, what do you say we crank it up a notch?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm intrigued.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right, all we need is a little lighter fluid.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, but be careful okay, because I wanna get our security deposit back.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I think we said good-bye to that when we invented hammer darts.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do you even remember which part of the wall is not spackle?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh yeah, right here.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank you, Happy Holidays.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Now, that's trash. Young lady, you can't… Hey! Stop that young lady, she donated trash!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey!! The charity's on fire! Help! Oh good! Thank you, I need that. Whoa! What is that?! It's nine o'clock in the morning!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right. A room. A man enters, he looks suspicious. That's it? Joey, you're supposed to have five pages done by now! Including an exciting incident! And what is, and what is all this?! The official rulebook of Fireball.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, that's the uh, game we were playing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah, it's great! See you take a tennis ball, a bowl, and some lighter fluid—Op! Op!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This is helping your career?! Huh? I thought you wanted to be an actor not the creator of crazy lawsuit game!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You're right, you're right, I'll get back to work.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And shame on you! You should know better, Joey needs to work. Now come on!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No! Ah-ah-ah-ah-ah! You can have this back when the five pages are done! Ahh!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: I had a really nice time tonight.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So did I. I'm really glad Monica asked us out.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: I'd love to ask you in, but uh, my sister's visiting and I think she's asleep on the couch.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You're sister? You're sister's asleep on the couch? Ohhh! I saw her with you on the subway and now she's asleep on the couch!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Oh hey, great, you're up. Rachel, this is my sister Krista. Krista, this is Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi!

utterance.speaker: Krista
utterance.content: Nice to meet you. I wish you'd told me we were having company, I'd fix myself up!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Like it would help.

utterance.speaker: Krista
utterance.content: You are so bad!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: You are!

utterance.speaker: Krista
utterance.content: You are!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: You are!

utterance.speaker: Krista
utterance.content: You are!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: You are!

utterance.speaker: Krista
utterance.content: You are!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: You are so dead! I'm gonna get you.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, it was very nice meeting you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nobody! Nobody respects the bucket! You wouldn't believe what people put in here! Look! Okay, does this look like a garbage can to you?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Does it look like an ashtray?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Does it look like a urinal?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Eww!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So Pheebs, are you gonna go back out there or what?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, yeah! But I'm not gonna take anymore crap. Okay? No more Mrs. Nice Bucket!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, good for you. Y'know you're tough, you lived on the streets.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I'm gonna go back to being Street Phoebe. Yeah! Oh but, y'know what? I can't go totally back because Street Phoebe really wouldn't be friends with you guys. Sorry.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hey, umm, can I ask you guys something?

utterance.speaker: Monica and Ross
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Uh, I don't have any brothers so I don't know, but uh, did you guys wrestle?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-oh, yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: All the time. In fact, I was undefeated.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Uh, you weighted 200 pounds.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Still, I was quick as a cat.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, I met Danny's sister yesterday, and uh that was actually the girl on the subway.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, you're kidding.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, they were very y'know…wrestley. But, I guess that's normal?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We don't, we don't wrestle now.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, not since I got too strong for you.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Too strong for me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You wanna go right now? 'Cause I'll take you right now, buddy! You wanna go?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh fine.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ready? Wrestle!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, y'know what uh, actually, that's great. That helps a lot. Thanks.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Guys, come on! Let's go! The puck drops in 20 minutes! Come on, Joe!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Joey's not going.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I didn't finish my five pages.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, why can't you do them tomorrow?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Because tomorrow he's redoing yesterday's pages.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yesterday's pages did not reflect my best work.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Why don't you cut him a little slack? Okay? Maybe if he relaxes a little bit, he'll get some work done.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I think he's been relaxing enough, thanks to you and Fireball.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Dude, if you think Fireball's relaxing, you've obviously have never played.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The only reason you're doing this to Joey is because you're bored. Okay, it's not his fault that you're unemployed.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am not unemployed. I'm on sabbatical!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on look guys, don't fight.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: And the reason I'm doing this is because I am Joey's friend. And if you were a good friend, you'd be doing the same thing.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, so being a good friend means acting like a total jerk?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: If it does? Then you're an amazing friend of mine.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey-hey guys, hey! How about we settle this over a friendly game of Fireball? Huh? I'll go unhook the smoke detectors!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: How about we settle this right now! There! Now, no one's going to the game. Ha-ha-ha!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I paid for those tickets!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No you didn't. You said you would, but you never did!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: …so we finally get to the top of the mountain and airhead here forgets the camera!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, y'know the same thing happened to me one time.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: When did that happen to you?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Don't you remember when we were jogging in the park and we saw that really pretty bird and wanted to take a picture—I didn't have my camera!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh yeah. First off all, chasing the Churo guy isn't jogging.

utterance.speaker: Krista
utterance.content: Oh, this is so good you have got to try it.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Oh, damn! I got it on my pants.

utterance.speaker: Krista
utterance.content: Here, I'll get it.

utterance.speaker: Krista
utterance.content: We'd better take these pants off upstairs or that stain's gonna set.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Yep. I'm gonna wear these on our date tonight.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, great!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Okay, bye! Oh my God!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That was unbelievable!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Okay, see? I told you!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, wow, sorry Rach.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I don't believe they're brother and sister.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: They're brother and sister!!!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh whoa-whoa-whoa! Wait a minute, open up your hand; let me take a look. Quarter. Dime. Lint? Not interested in that. What's this? A Canadian coin? Get outta here!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Whoa-whoa-whoa! No drinks near the bucket! Set it down over there and then you can make a contribution! And you can leave the hurt bunny look over there too! Hi Bob! I thought I told you to get outta here!

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: Uh, Phoebe we've been getting complaints and uh, we're gonna move you to a less high-profile spot.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What?!

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: Umm, Ginger's gonna take over this corner.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: That chick can't handle my corner.

utterance.speaker: Bob
utterance.content: Look, either you leave, or we remove you.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Fine. All right, I'll give you one pointer. Look out for that bitch.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Oh, hey Rach! I thought we said seven?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah uh, y'know what uh, let's skip it.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: What?! Why?!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Umm, you-you and your sister seem to have umm, a very special bond, and…

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Oh great! That special bond again! Why do women have such a problem with the fact that I'm close with my sister?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, okay, look. I don't know, listen, I don't know what's going on here but let's…

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Do-do you, do you have brothers?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No, I have two sisters. But one of them has a very masculine energy.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Are you close with them?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: No-no, they're not very nice people.

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: Okay, listen, I really like you. Okay? I think this can go somewhere. So what if I'm close to my family, are you gonna let that stand in the way of us?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, uh, I-I don't know. See when-when you put it that way y'know it does sort of…

utterance.speaker: Krista
utterance.content: Danny! Hurry up! The bath is getting cold!

utterance.speaker: Danny
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, okay, I'll see you later.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh hey! There's some kids playing in the street, you wanna go down there and give them a project, ruin their day?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey, if they have a ball maybe you can stick razor blades in it and teach them a new game, Gonna Need Stitches Ball.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey guys! I was at the library all morning and I already finished my five pages for today!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yay!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Great! Now, we can go to the Ranger game! Last night!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No dude, Ross tore up the tickets!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I guess when you don't have so many distractions, it's easier for you to focus. Huh?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah or also when you don't have somebody breathing down your neck ALL THE LIVE LONG DAY!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, well, that's fine, but the important thing is that I finished it. And uh, I think it's really good, but y'know it'd really help me is if I could hear it. So would you guys read it for me?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: All right.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay. "It's a typical New York City apartment. Two guys are hanging out." Ross

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey man.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What is up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: About yesterday, I was really wrong. I am sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, it was me. I'm sorry. I over reacted.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Maybe it was both of us, but we had our best friend's interest… But we had our best friend's interest at heart.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Could I be more sorry.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I don't know, I'm one sorry polentologist. All right Joey, we get it. I'm sorry.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I'm sorry too.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh no! No-no, keep reading! The good part's coming up. Keep going.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I am sorry, Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I am sorry, Ross.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: A handsome man enters. Hey! How's it going guys? I don't know what you two were talking about, but I'd like to say thanks to both of you. You, you wouldn't let me give up on myself, and you well you co-created Fireball. The end.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: This took you all day?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No-no, this only took five minutes. I spent the rest of the day coming up with new, Ultimate Fireball. Ha-ha!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, it's a typical New York City apartment. Two girls are just hanging out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi, how are you doing Kelly?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm doing just fine! God, Tiffany, you smell so great!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: It's my new perfume. Why don't you come closer where you can really appreciate it?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, y'know Joey, you are sick!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: This is disgusting!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm not reading this!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?! Wait-wait-wait! The handsome man was about to enter!!
